title: 1B1Ba w/ SoundTec Flooring, Large Windows, and Open Floor Plan
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom + 1 Den, 1 Bath, approximately 1024 Sq.
Acappella Apartments at The Crossing Introduces Contemporary Luxury Living in the Heart of the San Francisco Peninsula.

Positioned within San Bruno's The Crossing, Acappella boasts an ideal location with a variety of nearby shopping, dining, entertainment options, walking distance to 2 parks, and easy access to public transportation and major freeways.
The luxury apartments are masterfully crafted to create a quality living environment through a unique blend of timeless luxury design.

Telecommunications System, 9' High Ceiling, Extra-large Windows, GE Stainless Appliances, Spacious Walk-in Closets, GE Washer/Provided, Individual Patios and Balconies, Heating & Air Conditioning in Every Home, Hello Alfred!
The Properties Home Assistant, Quartz Countertops, Newly Upgraded Sound-tec Floating Floor Flooring, USB Ports, Spa Inspired Shower Heads

Walking Distance to Shops, Smoke-Free lifestyle in our community, Lavish Interior Courtyard, (BART, CalTrain), Public Dog Park, Fully Equipped 24/7 Fitness Center, Public Park, Outdoor Pool and Spa, BBQ grills, Underground Parking, Close to Public Transportation
